changeSet.author: ali.khan
changeSet.sql: insert into lookup_entry(value, lookupheader_id) select 'Residential',id from lookup_header where code = 'LOC_TYPE' union select 'Commercial',id from lookup_header where code = 'LOC_TYPE' union select 'WiFi',id from lookup_header where code = 'LOC_FACILITY' union select 'Car Wash',id from lookup_header where code = 'LOC_FACILITY' union select 'Day Hour',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_PP' union select 'Night Hour',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_PP' union select 'Full Day',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_PP' union select '12 Hr(Night)',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_PP' union select '12 Hr(Day)',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_PP' union select 'Full Month',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_PP' union select 'Car',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select 'Mini Van',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select 'Cargo/15 psgr van',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select '10 ft truck',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select '16 ft truck',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select '24 ft truck',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select 'Trailer',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select '53 ft Trailer',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select 'School Bus',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select 'Charter Bus',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT' union select 'All Vehicles',id from lookup_header where code = 'PS_VT'
